column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////What a fantastic experience! We walked in hoping to score seats at the bar and were very pleased to find room. I started with the salmon tartare which turned out to be a generous portion and more than enough to share. We ordered a bottle of wine from their expansive and impressive list and followed up with main courses of steak - of course! The steak was absolutely divine: perfectly cooked
